Articles.Content:
I have been wanting, for quite some time. To have an epic anthem for my company, Kerbal Minds Corp. I would make one myself, but I just got out of my music composition course and lost my software to make it... and I am unable to do anything software heavy atm to get it, so that I can make myself one.

So, I was hoping someone could make me one... I was hoping, maybe a bit rockish, but also Apollo 13-ish... But I'll enjoy whatever anyone can make .

I haven't posted anything in a while (about a month) since I am converting to Youtube channels, but if you see anything on here let me know.

https://soundcloud.com/billy-winn-2
